Title: Vaccine divergence
Paragraphs:
Since easing rules on social gatherings, the vaccinated and unvaccinated have begun living “divergent” lives due to different restrictions. However, there has been a bit of discontent and discomfort towards the latest rules as some members of the public feel it’s an “act of discrimination” towards the unvaccinated, including those who are ineligible for vaccinations.
In our poll, 91% support the differentiated COVID-19 restrictions between vaccinated & unvaccinated individuals.
Author: Shantini Shantini
